text: At a remembrance for Walter Jones tonight, there was not one photo of the congressman. But his flag-draped coffin was flanked by hundreds of photos of fallen soldiers from the Iraq war. This is how he wanted it. Rest In Peace.

text: Congressman Walter Jones was a friend. He was thoughtful, devout and genuine. We had many enjoyable discussions about life and politics over dinner and wine. Rest In Peace congressman. I will miss you.
